cards.name: Dragon Pole (beta)
cards.text: You have 2 additional arcane slot. [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack for each of your arcane slots that is filled. If at least 2 of your arcane slots are filled, this attack deals +1 damage. If you succeed, you may place the top card of your deck facedown in your play area, as an Audra (It takes up an arcane slot. If it leaves play, add it to your hand.) Card designed by the Pride of Arkham

cards.name: Alice Luxley (beta)
cards.text: You get +1 [intellect]. [reaction] After horror is placed in Alice Luxley: Your location gets -2 shroud until the end of the active investigator's turn. [reaction] After you discover a clue, exhaust Alice Luxley: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location. Card designed by the Pride of Arkham

cards.name: Guard Dog (beta)
cards.text: [free] Exhasut Guard Dog: Engage an enemy at your location. That enemy attacks you. [reaction] When an enemy attack deals damage or horror to Guard Dog: Deal 1 damage to the attacking enemy. Card designed by the Council-in-Exile at Arkham Nights 2020

cards.name: Flashlight (beta)
cards.text: Uses (4 supplies). [reaction] When you perform a skill test while investigating or attemting to evade, spend 1 supply: This test gets -2 difficulty.. Card designed by the Council-in-Exile at Arkham Nights 2020

cards.back_flavor: This is a placeholder for Carson Sinclair. The back of this card will be updated when we know Carson's deckbuilding.
cards.back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Guardian cards level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): "As you wish", Selfless to a Fault, 1 random basic weakness.
cards.name: Carson Sinclair
cards.text:
You may take an additional action during your turn, which can only be used on the below [action] ability.
[action]: Choose another investigator at your location. They immediately take an action as if it were their turn. (Limit once per round for each investigator.)
[elder_sign] effect: +0. Draw 1 card. You may resolve this effect anytime another investigator at your location resolves their [elder_sign] effect.

cards.back_flavor: This is a placeholder for Amina Zidane. The back of this card will be updated when we know Amina's deckbuilding.
cards.back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Mystic cards level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Word of Woe, Word of Weal, Deafening Silence, 1 random basic weakness.
cards.flavor: "What is it trying to tell me?"
cards.name: Amina Zidane
cards.text:
[reaction] When you play an asset: Reduce its resouce cost by 3. It enters play with 1 doom on it. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +2. You may move all doom from a card at your location to another card at your location.

cards.customization_change:
Item. Armor. Relic.
Hunter's Armor may be assigned damage and/or horror dealt to other investigators at your location.


Playing Hunter's Armor does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
After 1 or more damage or horror is assigned to Hunter's Armor from a treachery effect, you may exhaust it to draw 1 card.
After 1 or more damage or horror is assigned to Hunter's Armor from an enemy attack, you may exhaust it to deal 1 damage to that enemy.
cards.customization_text: □ Enchanted. Hunter's Armor gains the [[Relic]] trait and takes up an arcane slot instead of a body slot. □□ Protective Runes. Hunter's Armor may be assigned damage and/or horror dealt to other investigators at your location. □□ Durable. Hunter's Armor gains +2 health. □□ Hallowed. Hunter's Armor gains +2 sanity. □□ Lightweight. Hunter's Armor gets -1 cost and playing it does not provoke attacks of opportunity. □□□ Hexdrinker. After 1 or more damage or horror is assigned to Hunter's Armor from a treachery effect, you may exhaust it to draw 1 card. □□□ Armor of Thorns. After 1 or more damage or horror is assigned to Hunter's Armor from an enemy attack, you may exhaust it to deal 1 damage to that enemy.
cards.flavor: You cobbled this suit together yourself from the remnants of ancient armor, mixed with more modern "bulletproof" plating used in the Great War. It's not much, yet. But with some improvements, maybe it'll be enough.
cards.name: Hunter's Armor

customization_options.real_text: - Glory - If this attack defeats an enemy, choose one: draw 1 card, heal 1 damage, or heal 1 horror.

cards.customization_change: Item. Weapon. Melee. Relic. - Glory - If this attack defeats an enemy, choose one: draw 1 card, heal 1 damage, or heal 1 horror. - Elders - If this attack succeeds by an amount equal to or greater than your location's shroud, discover 1 clue at your location. - Hunt - Immediately move to a connecting location or engage an enemy at your location. - Fury - If this attack is successful, in addition to its standard damage, deal 1 damage to each other enemy engaged with you. You may imbue the same inscription up to three times. Customizable. Uses (4 charges). Replenish 2 of these charges at the start of each round. [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. Before this attack, you may spend any number of charges to imbue the axe with twice as many different inscriptions -
cards.customization_text: □ Heirloom. This asset gets -1 cost and gains the [[Relic]] trait. □ Inscription of Glory. Add this inscription: "- Glory - If this attack defeats an enemy, choose one: draw 1 card, heal 1 damage, or heal 1 horror.". □ Inscription of the Elders. Add this inscription: "- Elders - If this attack succeeds by an amount equal to or greater than your location's shroud, discover 1 clue at your location." □ Inscription of the Hunt. Add this inscription: "- Hunt - Immediately move to a connecting location or engage an enemy at your location." □ Inscription of Fury. Add this inscription: "- Fury - If this attack is successful, in addition to its standard damage, deal 1 damage to each other enemy engaged with you." □□□ Ancient Power. You may imbue the same inscription up to three times. □□□ Saga. Replenish 2 of Runic Axe's charges at the start of each round, instead of only 1. □□□□ Scriptweaver. For every charge spent, you may imbue the axe with up to two different inscriptions.
cards.name: Runic Axe
cards.text: Customizable. Uses (4 charges). Replenish 1 of these charges at the start of each round. [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. Before this attack, you may spend any number of charges to imbue the axe with that many different inscriptions - - Accuracy - You get an additional +2 [combat] for this attack. - Power - This attack deals +1 damage.

cards.customization_change:
- Heal 2 damage.
- Heal 2 horror.
- Place 1 charge or secret on an asset you control.
- Move up to 2 times.
Customizable. Uses (5 supplies).
When you initiate this skill test, you may increase its difficulty by 2. If you do, increase the value of the effect granted by each option by 1 for this test.
[action] Spend 1 supply: Choose an investigator at your location and test [intellect] (1). If you succeed, that investigator performs one of the following options (2 options instead if you succeed by 2 or more) -
cards.customization_text: □ Mending Distillate. Add this option: "- Heal 2 damage.". □ Calming Distillate. Add this option: "- Heal 2 horror." □ Enlightening Distillate. Add this option: "- Place 1 charge or secret on an asset you control." □ Quickening Distillate. Add this option: "- Move up to 2 times." □□ Refined. Alchemical Distillation enters play with 2 additional supplies on it. □□□□ Empowered. When you initiate this skill test, you may increase its difficulty by 2. If you do, increase the value of the effect granted by each option by 1 for this test. □□□□□ Perfected. If you succeed by 2 or more, the chosen investigator may perform two different options instead of one.
cards.name: Alchemical Distillation
cards.text:
Customizable. Uses (3 supplies).
[action] Spend 1 supply: Choose an investigator at your location and test [intellect] (1). If you succeed, that investigator performs one of the following options -
- Draw 2 cards.
- Gain 2 resources.

cards.customization_change:
- You run out of cards in your hand.
- You are dealt damage or horror.
- You discard a treachery or enemy from play.
- You enter a location with 3 or more shroud.
When the chosen criteria is met by any investigator at your location, you may exhaust Empirical Hypothesis to add 1 evidence to it. Other investigators at your location may trigger [fast] abilities on Empirical Hypothesis.
[fast] Spend 2 evidence: Reduce the cost of the next card you play by 3.
[fast] Spend 3 evidence: Discover 1 clue at your location.
After you exhaust Empirical Hypothesis, you may resolve its forced effect, choosing a criteria you have not chosen this round. Then, ready it.
cards.customization_text: □ Pessimistic Outlook. Add the following criteria:"you run out of cards in your hand". □ Trial and Error. Add the following criteria: "you are dealt damage or horror." □ Independent Variable. Add the following criteria: "you discard a treachery or enemy from play." □ Field Research. Add the following criteria: "you enter a location with 3 or more shroud." □□ Peer Review. The chosen criteria is met if any investigator at your location meets it, instead of only you. Other investigators at your location may trigger [fast] abilities on Empirical Hypothesis. □□ Research Grant. Empirical Hypothesis gains: "[fast] Spend 2 evidence: Reduce the cost of the next card you play by 3." □□□ Irrefutable Proof. Empirical Hypothesis gains: "[fast] Spend 3 evidence: Discover 1 clue at your location." □□□□ Alternative Hypothesis. After you exhaust Empirical Hypothesis, you may resolve its forced effect, choosing a criteria you have not chosen this round. Then, ready it.
cards.name: Empirical Hypothesis
cards.text: Customizable. Limit 1 per investigator. Forced - At the start of the round: Choose one of the following criteria for this round - - You fail a test by 2 or more. - You succeed at a test by 3 or more. When the chosen criteria is met, you may exhaust Empirical Hypothesis to add 1 evidence to it. [fast] Spend 1 evidence: Draw 1 card.

cards.customization_change: Named asset: Using attached asset's [action] abilities does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Attached asset does not take up any slots. You get +2 skill value while performing skill tests on attached asset. Additional named assets: [fast] Exhaust The Raven Quill: Move 1 secret or charge from an asset you control to attached asset. Attach to a named asset you control, or you may search your deck, discard pile, and hand for a copy of a named asset and play it (paying its cost). Then, attach The Raven Quill to it.
cards.customization_text: Named [[Tome]] or [[Spell]] asset: □ Living Quill. Using attached asset's [action] abilities does not provoke attacks of opportunity. □ Spectral Binding. Attached asset does not take up any slots. □□ Mystic Vane. You get +2 skill value while performing skill tests on attached asset. □□ Endless Inkwell. Name two more [[Tome]] or [[Spell]] assets: □□ Energy Sap. The Raven Quill gains: "[fast] Exhaust The Raven Quill: Move 1 secret or charge from an asset you control to attached asset." □□□□ Supernatural Record. When you play The Raven Quill, instead of attaching it to a named asset you control, you may search your deck, discard pile, and hand for a copy of a named asset and play it (paying its cost). Then, attach The Raven Quill to it.
cards.name: The Raven Quill
cards.text:
Customizable. When you purchase The Raven Quill, name a [[Tome]] or [[Spell]] asset and record that name on its upgrade sheet.
Attach to a named asset you control.
[reaction] When you resign or the game ends: Either mark a checkbox on The Raven Quill's upgrade sheet, or reduce the experience cost to upgrade the attached asset before the next scenario by 1.

cards.customization_change:
While investigating using Damning Testimony, you may ignore any effect or keyword on the investigated location that would trigger.
Customizable. Uses (5 evidence).
You get +2 [intellect] while investigating using Damning Testimony.
When you successfully investigate using Damning Testimony, you may spend 1 evidence to automatically evade the chosen enemy.
You may use Damning Testimony's ability to investigate the chosen enemy's location instead of your location.
When you successfully investigate using Damning Testimony, you may spend X evidence to discard the chosen enemy if it is non-[[Elite]]. X is that enemy's remaining health.
cards.customization_text: □ Search Warrant. While investigating using Damning Testimony, you may ignore any effect or keyword on the investigated location that would trigger. □□ Fabricated Evidence. Damning Testimony enters play with 2 additional evidence on it. □□ Blackmail. You get +2 [intellect] while investigating using Damning Testimony. □□□ Extort. When you successfully investigate using Damning Testimony, you may spend 1 evidence to automatically evade the chosen enemy. □□□ Surveil. You may use Damning Testimony's ability to investigate the chosen enemy's location instead of your location. □□□□ Expose. When you successfully investigate using Damning Testimony, you may spend X evidence to discard the chosen enemy if it is non-[[Elite]]. X is that enemy's remaining health.
cards.name: Damning Testimony
cards.text: Customizable. Uses (3 evidence). [action] Exhaust Damning Testimony and choose an enemy at any location: Investigate. (your location). If you succeed, you may spend 1 evidence to discover 1 additional clue at the chosen enemy's location.

cards.customization_change: Summoned Servitor can be assigned damage dealt to any investigator at its location. - Fight. You fight any enemy at this location with a base [combat] of 4. Ignore the aloof and retaliate keywords for this attack. - Evade. You attempt to evade any enemy at this location with a base [agility] of 4. Ignore the alert keyword for this evasion attempt. - Investigate. You investigate this location with a base [intellect] of 4. After Summoned Servitor moves from your location to a connecting location, you may move to that location, as well. Customizable. As an additional cost to play Summoned Servitor, you must discard another asset you control or return that asset to its owner's hand. Summoned Servitor enters play at your location. It can take 2 different actions during each of your turns, which can only be used to take the following actions:
cards.customization_text: □ Armored Carapace. Summoned Servitor gains a health value of 3. It can be assigned damage dealt to any investigator at its location. □ Claws that Catch. Add this action: "- Fight. You fight any enemy at this location with a base [combat] of 4. Ignore the aloof and retaliate keywords for this attack." □ Jaws that Snatch. Add this action: "- Evade. You attempt to evade any enemy at this location with a base [agility] of 4. Ignore the alert keyword for this evasion attempt." □ Eyes of Flame. Add this action: "- Investigate. You investigate this location with a base [intellect] of 4." □ Wings of Night. After Summoned Servitor moves from your location to a connecting location, you may move to that location, as well. □□ Dominance. Summoned Servitor no longer takes up an (circle one): arcane / ally slot. □□□ Dreaming Call. Instead of discarding another asset you control in order to play Summoned Servitor, you may return that asset to its owner's hand. □□□□□ Dæmonic Influence. Summoned Servitor can take 2 different actions instead of 1 during each of your turns.
cards.name: Summoned Servitor
cards.text:
Customizable. As an additional cost to play Summoned Servitor, you must discard another asset you control.
Summoned Servitor enters play at your location. It can take 1 action during each of your turns, which can only be used to take the following action:
- Move Summoned Servitor to a connecting revealed location.

customization_options.real_text: - 'Mercy.' An investigator at this enemy's location heals damage or horror equal to this enemy's respective damage/horror value.

cards.customization_change: - "Betray." Deal 1 damage to any enemy at this enemy's location with an equal or lower fight value than this enemy. - "Mercy." An investigator at this enemy's location heals damage or horror equal to this enemy's respective damage/horror value. - "Confess." Discover 1 clue at this enemy's location if its health is equal to or higher than its location's shroud. - "Distract." Automatically evade any enemy at this enemy's location with an equal or lower evade value than this enemy. [fast]: Return Power Word to your hand. You may activate the parley ability on Power Word from up to one location away from the attached enemy. [action] If attached enemy is at your location: Parley. Give it up to two different commands (limit once per round per command) - You may include three copies of Power Word in your deck. When you give a command using one copy, also give that command to each other enemy with one of your copies of Power Word attached.
cards.customization_text: □ Betray. Add the command: "- 'Betray.' Deal 1 damage to any enemy at this enemy's location with an equal or lower fight value than this enemy." □ Mercy. Add the command: "- 'Mercy.' An investigator at this enemy's location heals damage or horror equal to this enemy's respective damage/horror value." □ Confess. Add the command: "- 'Confess.' Discover 1 clue at this enemy's location if its health is equal to or higher than its location's shroud." □ Distract. Add the command: "- 'Distract.' Automatically evade any enemy at this enemy's location with an equal or lower evade value than this enemy." □□ Greater Control. Power Word gains "[fast]: Return Power Word to your hand." □□□ Bonded. You may activate the parley ability on Power Word from up to one location away from the attached enemy. □□□ Tonguetwister. When you parley with Power Word, you may give up to two different commands. □□□ Thrice Spoken. You may include three copies of Power Word in your deck. When you give a command using one copy, also give that command to each other enemy with one of your copies of Power Word attached.
cards.name: Power Word
cards.text: Customizable. Fast. Play only during your turn. Attach to a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location. [action] If attached enemy is at your location: Parley. Give it a command (limit once per round per command) - - "Go." This enemy moves once in a direction of your choice. - "Cower." This enemy exhausts.

cards.customization_change:
Other investigators at your location may use the ability on Pocket Multi Tool.
You get an additional +1 skill value if this is during a skill test on a treachery.
You get an additional +1 skill value if this is during an attack.
You get an additional +1 skill value if this is during an evasion attempt.
You get an additional +1 skill value if this is during an investigation.
After you fail a skill test, ready Pocket Multi Tool.
[reaction] When you would fail a skill test you are performing, exhaust Pocket Multi Tool: You get +1 skill value for this test.
cards.customization_text: □ Detachable. Other investigators at your location may use the ability on Pocket Multi Tool. □ Pry Bar. You get an additional +1 skill value if this is during a skill test on a treachery. □□ Sharpened Knife. You get an additional +1 skill value if this is during an attack. □□ Signal Mirror. You get an additional +1 skill value if this is during an evasion attempt. □□ Magnifying Lens. You get an additional +1 skill value if this is during an investigation. □□□ Lucky Charm. After you fail a skill test, ready Pocket Multi Tool. □□□ Spring-Loaded. Pocket Multi Tool's ability is now a [reaction] ability with the trigger: "When you would fail a skill test you are performing, exhaust Pocket Multi Tool..."
cards.name: Pocket Multi Tool
cards.text:
Customizable. Limit 1 per investigator.
[fast] During a skill test you are performing, exhaust Pocket Multi Tool: You get +1 skill value for this test.

cards.customization_change:
Traits chosen: 
Additional Trait: 
Additional Trait: 
If this is a skill test on or against an enemy with a chosen trait and the test is successful, you may attach Grizzled to that enemy. Reduce the difficulty of tests on or against the attached enemy by 1.
If this skill test is on a treachery with a chosen trait and the test is successful, you may add both Grizzled and this treachery to the victory display.
After you draw an encounter card with a chosen trait, return one copy of Grizzled from your discard pile to your hand. (Max once per round.)
cards.customization_text: [[Traits]] chosen: □ Specialist. Choose another trait: □□ Specialist. Choose another trait: □□□ Nemesis If this is a skill test on or against an enemy with a chosen trait and the test is successful, you may attach Grizzled to that enemy. Reduce the difficulty of tests on or against the attached enemy by 1. □□□□ Mythos-Hardened. If this skill test is on a treachery with a chosen trait and the test is successful, you may add both Grizzled and this treachery to the victory display. □□□□□ Always Prepared. After you draw an encounter card with a chosen trait, return one copy of Grizzled from your discard pile to your hand. (Max once per round.)
cards.name: Grizzled
cards.text: Customizable. When you purchase Grizzled, choose and record two [[Traits]] on its upgrade sheet. If this is a skill test on or against an encounter card (including fighting, evading, or parleying), Grizzled gains [wild][wild] for each of the chosen traits that encounter card possesses.
